name: Digital signage mac client
body:
This client works with our [digital signage rails application](https://github.com/biola/digital_signage/). Just set up the server, create a sign, and under preferences point the url in this mac app to the sign's display page.

**Features**

* Launch in full screen
* Hide mouse
 
### Authors and Contributors
